Vivid Sydney 2026 - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Vivid Sydney 2026 Experience Australia's biggest and brightest festival - Vivid Sydney as it transforms the Harbour City into a kaleidoscope of colour from 22 May – 13 June 2026! Explore the program of Vivid Light, Music, and Food in the heart of Sydney, united by the invitation to dream big, without boundaries. Immerse yourself in this unique experience and make the most of both the free and ticketed events that Vivid Sydney has to offer. Deal Details Travel Dates 21 May 2026 - 14 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $859 Enquire Now Experience Australia's biggest and brightest festival - Vivid Sydney as it transforms the Harbour City into a kaleidoscope of colour from 22 May – 13 June 2026! Explore the program of Vivid Light, Music, and Food in the heart of Sydney, united by the invitation to dream big, without boundaries. Immerse yourself in this unique experience and make the most of both the free and ticketed events that Vivid Sydney has to offer. Accommodation Rydges World Square + Vivid Dinner Cruise (4 stars) Rydges World Square allows guests to be in the heart of Sydney CBD located on the corner of Pitt and Liverpool streets with entertainment and dining nearby. Experience the warm and friendly staff at Rydges World Square featuring accommodation to take advantage of modern comforts and thoughtful amenities throughout the hotel. Guest rooms are luxurious, modern and well-equipped with free Wi-Fi and cosy Rydges Dream Bed making for a relaxing stay. Vivid Dinner Cruise - Step aboard the Captain Cook Vivid Dinner Cruise for a dazzling 2-hour journey through Sydney Harbour. Enjoy a delicious dinner as the city’s iconic landmarks glow with vibrant Vivid Sydney lights. With panoramic views, a 2-course meal and a relaxed atmosphere, it’s the perfect way to experience the festival in style. Unforgettable sights, flavours, and moments await! Rooms Executive room (3 nights) 21 May - 14 Jun 26 Stay price: $859.00 Includes: Vivid Dinner Cruise Note: Vivid Dinner Cruise is non refundable once booked. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, double share Airfares are additional Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 04 November 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 04 November 2025 until 30 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. Airfares are additional. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply.Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs.Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
